DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study patient severe , though stable , cystic fibrosis ( CF ) whose routine treatment include Pulmozyme . Patients randomize either continue Pulmozyme therapy withdrawn 2 week ( placebo group ) . Patients must stable CF symptom without change therapy 2 week prior enrollment order participate .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Pulmozyme Withdrawal Exercise Tolerance Cystic Fibrosis Subjects With Severe Lung Disease ( TOPIC )
